name: DeadLine (itch) (ADeCenzo)
description:
DeadLine

I recommend downloading DeadLine.zip instead of playing in the browser; the game is not really optimized for WebGL.


For the passengers of the Red Line, today is the day they die. For you it’s the average call. As an Operator, it’s your duty to provide temporal life insurance to well-paying clients, one of which took the wrong red-eye train and is due for a rude awakening unless you can disarm the time-bomb hidden onboard. With time frozen it shouldn’t be too difficult to solve the puzzle… Unless the timer keeps ticking.

Features:

  • Time is frozen onboard the Red Line, but the bomb’s timer keeps ticking.
  • Interact with the frozen environment:
    • Petty theft
    • Commit breaking and entering
    • Mess with high voltage electricity
    • Rummage through luggage
  • Find the most efficient route to discover the assassin and disarm the bomb
  • Hidden rotary phones to provide help from the mysterious Temporal Life Agency
  • Explore the entire length of the train, find the bomb, save your client!
